about_the_game:
ARE YOU UP TO THE CHALLENGE?

Murderous Muses is an old-school FMV adventure that rewards patience, exploration and puzzle solving. It’s not an interactive movie game but it does have over 3 hours of FMV!

WHO KILLED MORDECHAI GREY?

Play as the gallery’s night watch and explore its secrets over three days, watching paintings spring to life fuelled by ‘Eyes of Mordechai’ - a scarce resource that makes you ask questions wisely.

A year has passed since the unsolved murder of Mordechai Grey and in tribute, Gallery Argenta is about to exhibit six of the artist’s most famous portraits and prime suspects - the ‘Murderous Muses’. Question suspects, unlock police interviews, and finally deduce who’s the murderous muse!

  • Solve a murder mystery that re-rolls every time you play


  • Explore a procedurally-generated gallery and share seeds with friends


  • Puzzles unlock bonus treasure rooms


  • A persistent ‘trophy room’ to store collectibles


  • A rich new story setting, Mirlhaven island


  • Final score cards and run times for bragging rights


Starring...
AISLINN DE’ATH as Lilith Rendell
ANNA FRASER as Sunday and Monday Finch
BETH GATHERER as Professor Catherine Myers
BEX FINCH as Dominique Serrant
DAVID JOHN-BORES as Xavier Haan
RIKKI STONE as Otto Pipistrelle
RACHEL COWLES as Kira
OLIVIA BOURNE as Sasha Venice
KLEMENS KOEHRING as Dr Crispin Howe
RUPERT BOOTH as Detective Salisbury
AYVIANNA SNOW as J.A.M.I.E.
WILL HARRISON-WALLACE as Higgins

A spine tingling new murder mystery from the developers of The Infectious Madness of Doctor Dekker, The Shapeshifting Detective and Dark Nights with Poe and Munro.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains strong psychological horror and adult themes including spoken references to suicide and drug and alcohol abuse. For a full list of content warnings please visit the website.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 / AMD Radeon HD 5750. OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Murderous Muses

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or greater or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Art plus murder equals pure joy.”
4.5/5 – Digitally Downloaded

“The challenging puzzles, clever interview segments, and open nature of the game made me feel like a genius when I finally cracked the case.”
9/10 – The Gaming Outsider

“The acting is brilliant, the writing is alluring and intriguing and the gameplay is fun.”
10/10 – That VideoGame Blog
short_description: Solve a sinister murder by spending three reality-shifting nights in a haunted art gallery. An infinitely re-playable murder mystery blending deduction, exploration, puzzles, collectibles and FMV.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, German, Italian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
